channel.title: Help please giant problem running client
channel.description: Everytime i run an actually good client i get this error. This happens to 317, 474, and 525's So if you could help me it would help so much!!! [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/281vfdf.png[/img]

item.title: Help please giant problem running client
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“Logitek, post:6, topic:382997”]i would recommend taking the java trails just start here: http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

once you got some of the basics down start with hyperion(the base included in the tutorial link i gave you) because its very cleaned and you can add anything you want yourself w/o worrying about crappy code people have stuffed into it.[/quote]

The hyperion server didn’t work it kept on bringing this error up when i run it…

Read full topic
item.source: Help please giant problem running client

item.title: Help please giant problem running client
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

i would recommend taking the java trails just start here: http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

once you got some of the basics down start with hyperion(the base included in the tutorial link i gave you) because its very cleaned and you can add anything you want yourself w/o worrying about crappy code people have stuffed into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please giant problem running client
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“Logitek, post:4, topic:382997”]dl it here: http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/

use this guide for setting up servers +http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,467475.msg3418042.html#msg3418042+

its for hyperion but it should work except for choosing where the main method is located.[/quote]

Thank’s man. And do you have any sources/clients that you have seen that you can recommend for me to code im starting out but im really good at it so far, and i just need to find the right one that isnt full with laggy cache, and any customs and stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: Help please giant problem running client

@Vhenom wrote:

Logitek:

it cant find the main method, set it up in eclipse.

Omg dude i’ve needed help with eclipse for such a long time idk how to use it, people tell me to use it but idk how so if you could help me with that it would be so great
